title: Silktide
creator: Silktide
description: Silktide automates accessibility testing of your websites to WCAG 2.1 standards (including mobile). See where issues occur on every page and get clear explanations and recommendations. Prioritize the most critical issues, create management reports, and become compliant more easily.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr title="Web Content Accessibility Guidelines">WCAG</abbr> 1.0 — <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
